meanings.definition: To cause someone to feel anxious or concerned.
meanings.sent1: Her constant questions beworry her friends.
meanings.sent2: I beworry about my upcoming exam.
meanings.sent3: The overprotective parent would beworry a rock.
meanings.sent4: The dark clouds beworry the farmers awaiting rain.
meanings.sent5: The eerie silence in the house beworries me.

meanings.definition: To be troubled or anxious about something.
meanings.sent1: He would beworry over every little detail.
meanings.sent2: Don't beworry, everything will be okay.
meanings.sent3: The cat would beworry about running out of treats.
meanings.sent4: The old house beworries me with its creaking floors.
meanings.sent5: She would beworry herself sick over the smallest things.
